Html: Just wondering, do the calculations for deep frost mages assume the +10% chance to critically hit from the winter's chill debuff? When i toggle the option on the debuffs menu, the dps for nearly all the talent builds goes up except for deep frost and 10/48/3 fire mages which don't change at all.

Winter's chill is automatically enabled if you have the talent. You can see it if you look at the comparison chart. Selecting it in the buffs means that someone else is providing the buff if you don't have it. So if you select it in frost spec it won't increase dps since it is already included.
